elsewherequests:acorninnwelcome-desc:
Welcome!

Did you just come through the rift?

Feeling okay?... Good.

Well, why don't I help you get settled. Did you manage to bring anything through with you?

Type forward slash starterkit with your inventory bar empty to see what you were able to bring with you through the rift.
elsewherequests:acorninnwelcome-obj: Give inn keeper the blue vessel: {0}/1
elsewherequests:acorninnfirewood-desc: We're high enough up that the fire needs to be lit around the clock. I've been far too busy to go down and gather firewood with all the new travelers about. Would you mind fetching some? I'll pay you for your time, of course.
elsewherequests:acorninningredients-desc: I need some ingredients for the evening meal. Was thinking of making some roast with cranberry sauce. Can you fetch the ingredients for me?
elsewherequests:acorninnmoreingredients-: I need some ingredients for the evening meal. Was thinking of making some mushroom stew. Can you fetch the ingredients for me?
elsewherequests:acorninngettingsettled-d:
You're welcome to stay in one of the available rooms upstairs, but if you're looking for something more permanent I'd go talk to the guard captain in the camp down in the valley. He's got plenty of work to go around, and will help you set up a decent place to stay in the camp.

While you're there, would you mind asking if my linen shipment has come in?
elsewherequests:tavernpuppersmallsnack-d: The dog looks at you and then pointedly at their empty bowl. The innkeeper seems pretty busy. Maybe you should just go grab the dog a snack.
elsewherequests:tavernpuppermissingpuppy: The dog looks very sad. You ask the tavern keeper what is wrong with her. They tell you they sold the dog's litter to one of the traders that passed through and thinks she misses them.
elsewherequests:valleycampintroduction-d:
The inn keeper at the Acorn sent you, huh?

Well, we've still got space down here, and I could use another pair of hands.

Why don't you clear a space of grass to start with while I see if I can find the Acorn's shipment.

PRE-REQ: Getting Settled from the Acorn Innkeeper
elsewherequests:valleycampmakingcamp1-de: Plot looks good. You're going to need a fence to mark out your section of the camp. If you go get some wood you can use my tools to make some fence. Plenty of pine around here, but watch out for the bears and wolves.
elsewherequests:valleycampmakingcamp2-de: We're going to need to get some more leather to make you a real tent. The wolves are getting out of hand up on the cliff anyway. Thin out the pack and bring me the hides.
elsewherequests:valleycampmakingcamp3-de:
I appreciate all the help. I have more work if you're interested, but if you're itching to get out an explore I can make you a tent bag. It'll help you pack your shelter up more quickly and make it all a bit easier to carry. I'd just need the materials to put it together.

I'll need some rope, a big of a hide as you can find, and some fat to prepare the hide with. Only thing is, the only creature large enough to get the hide from in this area are the bears...

If you are unsure how to make rope press 'H' to open your handbook and search for the recipe using the search bar.
elsewherequests:valleycampmakingcamp3-ob:
The captain is helping you make a tent bag.

Gather hide: {0}/1
Gather rope: {0}/1
Gather fat: {0}/1

Kill bear: {0}/1
elsewherequests:valleycampfirstaide-desc: You'd think some of these folks had never held anything sharp before. We're running low on poultices. Bring back some horsetail and reeds would you?
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyruntoaka: We're running low on salt, and I could probably make some better poultices with a stock of sulfur. Can you do a supply run to Akatin? It's about 20,000 North of here. I can pay you well for the journey.
Talk to the miner in Akatin about a supply of halite ({0}/16) and sulfur ({0}/16)
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyruntoand: We're almost out of hardtack. Don't give me that look, what we've got tastes awful because I had to bake it. If you're up for a journey there is a city called Andosa about 10,000 south west of here. You can bring us back some hardtack actually worth eatting.
Talk to baker in Andosa about a supply of herbal hardtack ({0}/32)
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyruntobri:
I need someone to travel to Bribus and fetch us more storage vessels, and a replacement for my kettle. Some of the new recruiters are turning out to be, well, let's say less than graceful.

Bribus is about 20,000 west of here.
Talk to the pottery in Bribus about a supply of vessels ({0}/4) for the camp, and a replacement kettle ({0}/1) for the captain.
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyruntohia: We need more grain. There's a farming settlement about 20,000 south of here. I'll pay you for a supply run for the camp.
Talk to the farmer in Hialing about a supply of grain ({0}/64) for the camp.
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyruntojul:
Well, the pully on the lift to bring shipments up the cliff just broke. We're stuck hauling crates up all those stairs until we get a replacement. Probably should get a few spare too.

I need you to travel to Jul to get us a new supply. It's about 10,000 north east of here.

Careful near the mountain, they only have nightwatchers setup around the town.
Talk to the blacksmith in Jul about a supply of pullies ({0}/4)
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyruntopra: We're going to build some wagons, but I don't have the carpentry skill to make some of the pieces we need. I need you to travel to Prashire and get some things made for us. It's about 20,000 east of here.
Talk to carpenter in Prashire about an order of wagon wheels ({0}/8) and shudders ({0}/4).
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyruntoucr: I don't know what it is, some spiny machine thing they found in a ruin up in Ucresa. The Librarian got a letter about it, and, well you know how he is. He doesn't want to wait for the next caravan. I'll need you to travel up to Ucresa. It's about 10,000 north west of here.
Talk to the archaelogist in Ucresa and get the armillary ({0}/1) they found in a dig.
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyruntowen: We're going to hunt the forest silent at this rate. There's a ranch in Wens that sells cured meat. I need you to travel down there and establish a supply for the camp. It's about 10,000 south east from here. See if they have any live chickens they can part with too. Some eggs would be a good addition to our supplies.
Talk to the rancher in Wens about a supply of cured meat ({0}/16) and some chickens ({0}/2) to improve the camps food supplies.
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyrunfromu: Spinny thing?! It's an armillary sphere from before the first rifting! And in working order. Usually I have to send finds like these to Jul for restoration, and we've never found one so old before. Don't let the captain break it. I've heard about the amount of pottery he's having to order from Brisbus these days.

Spinny thing?! It's an armillary sphere from before the first rifting! And in working order. Usually I have to send finds like these to Jul for restoration, and we've never found one so old before. Don't let the captain break it. I've heard about the amount of pottery he's having to order from Brisbus these days.
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyrunfroma: Oh dear, Captain really tried to bake something himself. Best get you some supplies to take back before he poisons that whole camp. Here, take a couple gozinaki too for your trip back.
Oh dear, Captain really tried to bake something himself. Best get you some supplies to take back before he poisons that whole camp. Here, take a couple gozinaki too for your trip back.
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyrunfromj: Yeah, a few extra of pullies would be a good idea. I've seen the cliffs around spawn, and I would not want to haul crates up and down those stairs. Here are some for the repairs, and I'll have the traveling merchants add a few to their regular runs going forward.

Yeah, a few extra of pullies would be a good idea. I've seen the cliffs around spawn, and I would not want to haul crates up and down those stairs. Here are some for the repairs, and I'll have the traveling merchants add a few to their regular runs going forward.
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyrunfromp: Wagon, huh? Well, that will certainly be more comfortable to travel around in than those tents. I have plenty of wheels and such. The merchants always need them. Would you like a set for yourself? Upgrade that travel kit a bit.

Wagon, huh? Well, that will certainly be more comfortable to travel around in than those tents. I have plenty of wheels and such. The merchants always need them. Would you like a set for yourself? Upgrade that travel kit a bit.
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyrunfromh: Here you go. We have amaranth and sunflower right now, so I hope that'll do. Oh, and here. Have a few of these plums for your journey back.
Here you go. We have amaranth and sunflower grain right now, so I hope that'll do. Oh, and here. Have a few of these plums for your journey back.
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyrunfroma:
Really, spawn is that low on halite already? And he wants sulfur added to the order too. Must be growing fast down around Spawn.

Well, let me see. I think I have what you're looking for right here. Don't lose it, Captain pays really well for these runs.

Really, spawn is that low on halite already? And he wants sulfur added to the order too. Must be growing fast down around Spawn.

Well, let me see. I think I have what you're looking for right here. Don't lose it, Captain pays really well for these runs.
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyrunfromb: More vessels? And he's tea pot again! Are you new comers using them as target practice.
More vessels? And he's tea pot again! Are you new comers using them as target practice.
elsewherequests:valleycampsupplyrunfromw:
The captain is right to worry about over hunting the area around Spawn. Here is a batch of meat that should be well cured by now, and I'll work on arranging a regular supply with the traveling merchants.

As for the chickens, I can spare two. I should have more in the spring, but for now I need the rest to produce for my contracts with the cooks in Andosa.

As for the chickens, I can spare two. I should have more in the spring, but for now I need the rest to produce for my contracts with the cooks in Andosa.
